Class JsonRpcClient::Client::Post
In: lib/json_rpc_client.rb
Parent: Request

Unless we know that a procedure is idempotent, a POST call will be used. In case anyone wonders, GET and POST requests are roughly of the same speed - GETs require slightly more processing on the client side, while POSTs require slightly more processing on the service side.

Methods

new  

Public Class methods

183:         @req.body = {:version => '1.1', :method => name, :params => args}.to_json
